Generation V.Black: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.
Generation V.White: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
Generation V.Black 2: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
Generation V.White 2: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.

Generation VI.X: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
Generation VI.Y: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon appears just before someone passes away, so it's feared as an emissary of death.
Generation VIII.Shield: It lurks in cities, pretending to be a lamp. Once it finds someone whose death is near, it will trail quietly after them.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Lampent appears at the moment of death and promptly absorbs the spirit as it leaves the body.
Generation IX.Violet: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.

Generation VIII.Sword: Lake of Outrage Dusty Bowl , Giant's Cap , Hammerlocke Hills , Lake of Outrage , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Lake of Outrage Dusty Bowl , Giant's Cap , Hammerlocke Hills , Lake of Outrage , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
